languages.text: "Я зовусь Старший. Мое прежнее имя — Арильд — уже не имеет значения. Я — отец, ведущий свою семью к избавлению от мук, к спасению! Заря открыл мне глаза на правду — и мои дети увидят ее!"

traits.locale_text: "Я — отец, ведущий свою семью к избавлению от мук, к спасению! Заря открыла мне глаза на правду — и мои дети увидят ее!"

languages.text: "I'm the Chief. My former name, Aryld, is meaningless now. I am a father leading his family to deliverance from woes — to salvation! Aurora has opened my eyes to the truth — and my children will see it!"
languages.original_text: "Я зовусь Старший. Мое прежнее имя — Арильд — уже не имеет значения. Я — отец, ведущий свою семью к избавлению от мук, к спасению! Заря открыл мне глаза на правду — и мои дети увидят ее!"

traits.locale_text: "I am Senior. My former name, Aryld, is meaningless now. I am a father leading his family to deliverance from woes — to salvation! Aurora has opened my eyes to the truth — and my children will see it!"

"I am Senior. My former name, Aryld, is meaningless now. I am a father leading his family to deliverance from woes — to salvation! Aurora has opened my eyes to the truth — and my children will see it!"

"I am Senior. My former name, Aryld, is meaningless now. I am a father leading his family to deliverance from woes — to salvation! Aurora has opened my eyes to the truth — and my children will see it!"

"I am Senior. My former name, Aryld, is meaningless now. I am a father leading his family to deliverance from woes — to salvation! Aurora has opened my eyes to the truth — and my children will see it!"

"I'm the Chief. My former name, Aryld, is meaningless now. I am a father leading his family to deliverance from woes — to salvation! Aurora has opened my eyes to the truth — and my children will see it!"

"I'm the Chief. My former name, Aryld, is meaningless now. I am a father leading his family to deliverance from woes — to salvation! Aurora has opened my eyes to the truth — and my children will see it!"

languages.text: "Ich bin der Boss. Mein früherer Name Aryld ist bedeutungslos. Ich bin ein Vater, der seine Familie zur Erlösung vom Bösen führt! Aurora hat mir die Augen geöffnet — und auch meine Kinder werden die Wahrheit sehen!"
languages.original_text: "I'm the Chief. My former name, Aryld, is meaningless now. I am a father leading his family to deliverance from woes — to salvation! Aurora has opened my eyes to the truth — and my children will see it!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Senior. Mein früherer Name Aryld ist bedeutungslos. Ich bin ein Vater, der seine Familie zur Erlösung vom Bösen führt! Aurora hat mir die Augen geöffnet — und auch meine Kinder werden die Wahrheit sehen!"

languages.text: « Je suis le Chef. Mon ancien nom, Aryld, ne veut plus rien dire désormais. Je suis un père qui conduit sa famille vers la délivrance du malheur, vers le salut ! Aurore m'a ouvert les yeux, elle m'a fait voir la vérité, et mes enfants la verront aussi ! »
languages.original_text: "I'm the Chief. My former name, Aryld, is meaningless now. I am a father leading his family to deliverance from woes — to salvation! Aurora has opened my eyes to the truth — and my children will see it!"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis Senior. Mon ancien nom, Aryld, ne veut plus rien dire désormais. Je suis un père qui conduit sa famille vers la délivrance du malheur, vers le salut ! Aurore m'a ouvert les yeux, elle m'a fait voir la vérité, et mes enfants la verront aussi ! »

languages.text: “我是‘教长’，我曾经的名字叫艾瑞德，但现在已经没有意义了。我是一位父亲，正带领我的家人从苦难中解脱出来，给予他们救赎！‘极光’让我看到了真相，我的孩子们也会看到！”
languages.original_text: "I'm the Chief. My former name, Aryld, is meaningless now. I am a father leading his family to deliverance from woes — to salvation! Aurora has opened my eyes to the truth — and my children will see it!"

traits.locale_text: “我是‘长者’，我曾经的名字叫艾瑞德，但现在已经没有意义了。我是一位父亲，正带领我的家人从苦难中解脱出来，给予他们救赎！‘极光’让我看到了真相，我的孩子们也会看到！”

languages.text: 「私がチーフだ。かつての名、アリルドはもはや意味を持たない。私は家族を導く父であり、苦難からの救済へと導く者！オーロラは私に真実を示し、私の子供たちもそれを目の当たりにするだろう！」
languages.original_text: "I'm the Chief. My former name, Aryld, is meaningless now. I am a father leading his family to deliverance from woes — to salvation! Aurora has opened my eyes to the truth — and my children will see it!"

traits.locale_text: 「私はシニアだ。かつての名、アリルドはもはや意味を持たない。私は家族を導く父であり、苦難からの救済へと導く者！オーロラは私に真実を示し、私の子供たちもそれを目の当たりにするだろう！」

languages.text: «Soy el jefe. Mi antiguo nombre, Aryld, ya no tiene sentido. ¡Soy un padre que conduce a su familia a la liberación de los males, a la salvación! Aurora me ha abierto los ojos a la verdad, ¡y mis hijos la verán!».
languages.original_text: "I'm the Chief. My former name, Aryld, is meaningless now. I am a father leading his family to deliverance from woes — to salvation! Aurora has opened my eyes to the truth — and my children will see it!"

traits.locale_text: «Soy el mayor. Mi antiguo nombre, Aryld, ya no tiene sentido. ¡Soy un padre que conduce a su familia a la liberación de los males, a la salvación! Aurora me ha abierto los ojos a la verdad, ¡y mis hijos la verán!».

languages.text: "Bana Şef derler. Eski adım Aryld artık anlamsız. Ailesini günahtan çıkarıp kurtuluşa, selamete götüren bir babayım! Aurora sayesinde gözlerim hakikate açıldı, çocuklarımınki de açılacak!"
languages.original_text: "I'm the Chief. My former name, Aryld, is meaningless now. I am a father leading his family to deliverance from woes — to salvation! Aurora has opened my eyes to the truth — and my children will see it!"

traits.locale_text: "Bana Şef derler. Eski adım Aryld artık anlamsız. Ailesini günahtan çıkarıp kurtuluşa, selamete götüren bir babayım! Aurora sayesinde gözlerim hakikate açıldı, çocuklarımınki de açılacak!"
